head.title: Two Are Chosen For Creative Posts

hedline.hl1: Two Are Chosen For Creative Posts

abstract.p: Freelancers Dallas Itzen and Patrick O'Neill are named to share top creative post at New York office of TBWA/Chiat/Day (S)

block.p: Two freelancers have been named to share the top creative post at the New York office of TBWA/Chiat/ Day, part of the TBWA unit of the Omnicom Group. They succeed David Page, who was dismissed last week after 18 months as chief creative officer.

Brent Hodgins, a spokesman for the office, confirmed a report of the appointments this week in Adweek. The freelancers are Dallas Itzen, 37, and Patrick O'Neill, 35, who become executive creative directors.

Two freelancers have been named to share the top creative post at the New York office of TBWA/Chiat/ Day, part of the TBWA unit of the Omnicom Group. They succeed David Page, who was dismissed last week after 18 months as chief creative officer.

Brent Hodgins, a spokesman for the office, confirmed a report of the appointments this week in Adweek. The freelancers are Dallas Itzen, 37, and Patrick O'Neill, 35, who become executive creative directors.
They had been freelancing for TBWA/Chiat/Day New York for the last six months on the Orbitz account.
Ms. Itzen and Mr. O'Neill have also freelanced for New York agencies like DiNoto Lee and McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising.
